In case the slide into 3rd-world fascist/socialist police state wasn't already obvious.
 
 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G63FEamhpA0 - Florida
 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IfhUaUuG1sM - Washington

While I dispise most protesters (who really should be shot and beat), I will agree that the police officers actions there in the 1st video were criminal as well as dispicable.
 But, for the 2nd video, I'd have use real bullets and shot them all.
 
 One of the things often not seen is the back story. Can change context a lot.
 
 
 From my experience, dealing with police is a hit and miss proposition.

I despise the protest lifestyle crowd as much as anyone, but I find the police response truly over the top, and I don't think the backstory changes anything. There is no sense that the people being assaulted were in any way a danger to anyone. So sure, move them along if they're impeding traffic or whatever, drag them out of there if you have to, but the force used is truly over the top and uncalled for.

I despise the protest lifestyle crowd as much as anyone, but I find the police response truly over the top, and I don't think the backstory changes anything. There is no sense that the people being assaulted were in any way a danger to anyone. So sure, move them along if they're impeding traffic or whatever, drag them out of there if you have to, but the force used is truly over the top and uncalled for.

 
 
 I'd be hard pressed to find a back story to support police shooting a female lawyer in the face with a rubber bullet in an unporvoked attack and then later jest about it in private. Sounds too maliscious.
 
 As for the 2nd video, it's untold what the protestors could have done out of HOME VIDEO camera footage LOS to possibly provoke the police. Even tossing bottles or rocks. Masked men...simply deserve to be dispersed. How'd you feel about the KKK in full garb with a masked hood singing Christianish hymns and a throwing a bottle that struck a black cop?
 IMO, singing a pathetic and hypocritical "Give Peace A Chance" song of their momma's generation does not make them peacefully demonstrating. All the home video did initially was focus on the small knot of people, not the others on the periphery.
 I loved the '#### the Police' comment too.
 
 Simply matter is, 1st video and 2nd video circumstances and presentations are quite a bit different.
 1st video, organized and mature crowd of professionals being attacked by thuggish cops.
 2nd video, illigitimate offspring of a homeless leper rioting and simply being dispersed after provoking police. Call it, 'Self fulfilling prophesy'.

I'm all for non-violent protest.
 
 But when rocks and bottles start to fly, the non-violent part is no longer there. People often uderestimate the amount of damage a thrown cobble can inflict. Much less the innocent sounding bottles. You may wish to look up the effects the often used "whack the guy on the head with a bottle" has in real life: lost eyes, lifelong disfigurements, dead faces,...
 
 Protest must be DISCIPLINED.
 
 I also sometimes wonder whether some of those protesters are really protesters. It wouldn't be hard to get some people inside to act as "agent provocateur", discrediting the protest by turning it violent. A crowd is surprisingly easy to lead...

Z,

 Maybe you might want to get to know your fellow posters some prior to posting about them.
 
 I'm actually the OPPOSITE of what you think I am.
 
 I'm a follower of Chaos, pain, suffering and misery.
 
 I actually am quite VOCAL about this.
 Turn the other cheek...nonsense!
 Push 'em down and stomp their faces in with stileto heels!
 That'll teach 'em.

Tens of dead and more than 2000 wounded badly, shady characters in yellow-green shapeless garments beating citizens in the streets half to death. This is result of Yankees interfering into Georgian domestic policy. They made our president that loony puppet Saakashvili. They supplied scoundrels killing honest Georgians with most modern horrible chemical weapons. Don't speak, don't think, don't breath without master's order. Otherwise you'll be punished cruelly like those people on Rustaveli Square. All disagreeable mass media agencies are closed. And majority of agencies are disagreeable. So we're in informational blockade here. That is democracy Americanly. I say in all countries Yankees interested in (like Ukraine, Azerbaijan, Armenia, the Baltic states) will be the same sooner or later. For US don't bring democracy. They kill it and dance on its grave. And our patience is exhausted. We won't tolerate any American henchmen anymore.
